welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Locust Grove, where small-town charm meets big-city convenience. Known for its historic landmarks and picturesque scenery, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves all international flights and is connected to the main terminal via a shuttle train.

terminals.name: F Terminal
terminals.description: The F Terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: T Terminal
terminals.description: The T Terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic flights for Delta Airlines.

wifi.note: Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the primary hub for passenger and cargo flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
